reviews.review: [spoiler]Wheatley y u do dis[/spoiler]

So much more than a puzzle game. Brilliantly written, witty, and clever.  This game geniunely made me laugh, which is rare for me. The crazy physics makes this game incredibly fun as well, and the puzzles will help you dust off those cobwebs!
This is an Awesome Game that Makes Me laugh and Made me think WAYYYYY outside the box
Never trust anything that talks
Atualizando a minha lista de melhores jogos que joguei na vida,no topo está o Portal 2.

Spaaaace! A talking potato....what in God's Green Earth more do you need? You really must play this Game.
The story itself in great let alone the gameplay.

10 out of 10. Portals, explosions, crazy AIs, potatos. burning houses. 'Nuff said.

Oh yeah, and combustible lemons.
a great puzzling co-op game where you and your friends put your puzzle...portal skills to the test

One of my favorite games of all time. I've never felt more completely and utterly immersed in a game. From the writing to the design, to the music and dialogue, everything is done so successufly that you feel like you're living through Chell. The puzzles get progressively harder and some take a frustratingly long time, but the feeling when you figure them out is awesome. Nothin beats feeling super smart, right? Right. Want to feel smart? Buy the game.

One of the best games I have ever played.  The amazing writing, mixed with a great story,  A++ voice actor’s and amazing puzzles combine to make this one of the best games ever made.  The only downside to this game is that Valve has trouble counting to 3, and we may not get a sequel till next century.


P.S  I voted this game for the "Villain Most In Need Of A Hug" award <3

游戏好的方面前面的人已经说了很多了。有一个不太好的方面：由于经常的重力倒转，强制移动等等，3D眩晕感强烈。确切地说，这是唯一一款让我每次都能体会到强烈的3D眩晕的游戏，玩半个小时就能保证睡眠www
buy this game you will not regret it

This game is great. Good plot, good co-op, level editing fun.

虽然前作玩过，2代也玩完有段时间了，但直到现在才来写篇评测。
讲真，打字很累的！什么？你问我那为什么现在又写了？
我堂堂一介男儿，生在红旗下，长在社会主义大家庭，我会为了万恶的资本主义游戏平台一个区区不值钱的徽章出卖我的灵魂？
额...好吧，如果是《传送门2》的话，我是愿意的。

对于剧情描写优秀的游戏，我是一个容易代入的人，玩完《传送门2》的时候，我想我的情绪是复杂的，既有完成游戏的喜悦，但不知为什么更多的却是一股莫名的失落感，莫名地觉得Chell似乎不该从这座地下迷城里出来，与G姐继续这么待下去仿佛才是我心中希望看到的画面。
机器没有眼泪，那么G姐想念Chell的时候，会怎样表达自己的难过呢？
G姐说了，应该把有关Chell的记忆删除，这样就不会悲伤。向来毒舌的G姐能说出这样的话，说明她真的对Chell有了感情，然而她还是毅然决然地让Chell离开，因为她知道Chell想要的是什么，追求的是什么，她摒弃了程序的思维，宁愿在以后无限长的寿命时光中都思念着Chell，也要让Chell回到外面的世界，如果说Still alive 还能让人开心地听，那么当2代剧情最后G姐唱着 Want you gone 的时候，我觉得我是鼻头一酸的。相处了太久，好不太容易才成为朋友，却转眼就要分别，可能永生再难见，差不多就是这样吧？
可是一望无际的麦田，还有最后扔上来的一代的礼物，仿佛在告诉我这次是真的说再见的时候了，是在说这就是传送门这个系列最终的结局了。在那时我唯一想的是为什么关卡这么少，剧情这么快，我甚至希望出现个人把Chell打晕再扔回那个地下实验室去。
后来我想了想，可能这是每个人都会有的对美好故事的留恋吧。《传送门2》虽然说是FPS类解谜游戏，但剧情才是真正的画龙点睛之笔，无论是wheatley的蜕变，以及G姐的毒舌与傲娇，他们都是套着机器外壳活生生的人，有着自己的灵魂与人性，即使周边环境是完完全全的科幻未来风，依然能让玩家产生一种共鸣，这是一种无法言明但确实存在的感觉。所以玩完游戏后这么久，我依然能记得他们鲜明的个性与故事。
不得不说，良心V社真的又拿出了一部作品证明了他们的实力，一个仅仅用三个角色构建起精彩内容的作品，我觉得这一点让绝大多数国内游戏厂商找不到为自己作品辩解的理由。

最后我只想问问：
1.G姐到底是不是Chell母亲的人工智能思维？
2.求V社大佬了，能出3么？剧情我都帮你们想好了，比如wheatley从太空杀回来了？（手动滑稽）比如Chell深宅多年无法融入外界生活无奈回乡寻母？（大雾）我上一部如此迫切等续作的游戏等了7年了，叫L4D，是不是很眼熟？也特么是你们公司的！要不两个3代一起出了吧？
3.只有我觉得除了G姐炮台娘也贼萌么？（要是我有这么多萌物就在里面呆着了，没事老想着往外跑干什么 → →）

PS：本来想提名“我没哭，只是眼睛里进了点沙子”奖，后来想想还是改成了“最需要抱抱的反派”奖，为什么？我特么就是想抱G姐不行？！
This game has great Puzzles and a great story.
Best music.  Best gameplay.  Best voice acting.  Best game made.
Great game
After five years this is still my favorite game.
Portal 2 is a great game, just don't get stuck behind the wrong side of the glass panel at the end of course 4 co-op, otherwise you won't get the achievent Still Alive like my friend and I.

This game is by far one of my favorite games I have ever played. The story is fanomanal and the characters are lovable(and metal). the puzzles are fun but can be a little hard towrds the end but I never wanted to give up because I wanted to reach the end of the game so bad. BUY THE GAME!!!!

Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. Só não digo que é o melhor porque isso depende da categoria e do clima... mas ele desbanca vários outros que estão no topo de sua própria categoria. Engraçado, triste, melancólico, cruel, ingênuo, a comédia nunca é forçada e muitas vezes vem da própria sinistrez da situação. 
Um jogo para se jogar, e jogar de novo, e de novo, e mais uma vez.
Glad0s is the ONLY villian who needs a hug.

Amazing game--just finished it!
Took about 1000 hours to master the controls
800 hours to understand the puzzles
300 hours to comprehend the physics engine
and 500 hours to obtain mastery of quantum physics
a little bit of a time waster -- but worth it!!1
A definate classic due to the puzzles and wholesome fun!
This was a triumph...

No cabe duda, uno de los mejores juegos que a desarollado valve. Este juego me a llevado a jugar horas y horas, su desarollo de niveles es espectacular la comunidad a hecho grandes trabajaos con esto inclusibe algunos mejores que el modo historia, tambien eh jugado al primer portal pero nunca espere la gran experiencia que tendria con el segundo titulo es algo que comprueba que no todas las segundas partes son iguales o peores que las primeras si no mejores cada que lo juego termino jugando mas horas de lo que pensaba. Si te gusta el puzle, una gran comunidad y una gran historia (Que es contada de una forma expectacular) te encantara este juego.

Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. Jogabilidade revolucionária, brilhante. Exige coordenação, pensamento, lógica, e muita, muita paciência. São horas e horas de neurônios fritando em frente a esse jogo. E assim que a cabeça esfria fazendo outra coisa, você já quer logo voltar e tentar resolver aquele maldito puzzle que está te enroscando. 
Não faz muito tempo que zerei, e mesmo assim o jogo não ficou devendo nada aos jogos de hoje. Com certeza é um jogo atemporal, e o será por muito mais tempo.

Jogando hoje, em 2020, é um portal ao passado, uma boa época em que esse jogo foi lançado.

There are tons of categories I could put this up for in the Steam Awards, but I chose the naming one and called it "We Are a Family - Not Just a Community" Award. I chose this name because I feel that's what this game did for all of the community. When I think of Steam, I almost always think of Portal 2. The gameplay and storyline were great, but I think of it because of the staple of community inputs this brought to all of us. For years now, people have been making mods, maps, and addons in this great game and it's brought people together to play, experiment, test, and just have fun. While there are others like Garry's Mod and Team Fortress 2 that impliment user creations, none really compare to what Portal 2 means to the community.
A very good and fun game, but if your partner is a potato it gets kind of bland

前作と一気にプレイ
プレイし終わってニヤニヤできるゲームです。
フルプライスで買っても良いがValve製なのでよく安売りしている。

■良い点
最終戦～エンディングまでの伏線回収
豊富になったギミック
無印よりエイム技術が不要になった(落下中のポータル張替えが少なくなった)

■悪い点
Portalの入り口と出口で視点が動き回るので３D酔いしやすい(体感無印よりは楽)
一部レベルデザイン(旧テストチェンバーにたどり着くまでの道のりがどちらに向かえばいいかわかりづらいかった)
The cake is a lie
Timely game you should always play through at least once, then attempt to speedrun through. Fail, try again, fail again, give up, then play through it for the hell of it again.

le principe des portails est juste super interessant et très agréable a jouer,

il y a beaucoup d'humour et une possibilité de campagne en duo avec un ami qui de souvenir est vraiment drôle
les graphismes sont encore très interessant pour un jeux sortie en 2011.

je le conseillerai avec ma note 8,5/10

Played only the single player campaign, so I might try the other modes later on.

Things I liked:
-Felt sorry for knocking over cute robotic turrets. Firing thousands of rounds of bullets at me.
-Only listened to robotic or long dead voices. Best conversations ever.
-Defied physics by using physics. Who else can say they always land on their feet (except cats).
-Fell in love with potatoes and long strolls through abandoned facilities. Was absolutely lit.
-"I'm different" favourite line from a turret by how they say it, but doesn't really apply to me since i like this game like all the other 98% of people.

Things i didn't like:
-The story had to eventually end.
One of the best first person "shooters" of all time.

I picked this game up couple dags ago in the autumn sales. First thing i noticed, besides your humorous and clumsy robotguide,  was that even this game released in 2011 the graphics still holding up to todays standards. But that's not the only thing this game gives you. If you like a mind bending experience, Portal2 gives you that in a variety of puzzles each level of the lab has to offer. It builds up very good from easy to more challenging to incredibly frustrating levels. So even nooby, not very clever gamers like myself (who btw never played the first portal), can get through this game. recommended!

I had, and still have, a lot of fun with Portal 2. Absolutely recommended!!!!!!

Why are you looking at this review and not playing the game?  Seriously, if you a) played the first Portal, and/or b) love physics and physical puzzles, you will find this game fun, interesting, and addicting.  The addition of very solid multiplayer puts this game over the top, and will definitely leaving you coming back for more.

Just thinking about this game while writing this makes me want to reinstall it and play all over.
